feature ID | blank1_info_sec1 = 1351066 | website = | footnotes = }} Amarillo is a city in the U.S. state of Texas. It is in the northern part of Texas. The city's economy is mostly based on cattle. In 2020, 200,393 people lived there. == References == Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas
